tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Finished 48th on the final Order of Merit. Made one top-10 in his eight appearances. Had a career week at the Nine Dragons Open in mid-November. Finished T5 after recording rounds of 70-71-73-69 at the weather-delayed event at Nine Dragons GC. Had never enjoyed a top-10 prior to the week in Jiaxing, his best finish a 12th-place effort at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open. Began the final round in 14th place after a 1-over 73. Recovered and earned a nice paycheck on the final day with a 3-under 69, thanks to two late birdies, at No. 16 and No. 18. Big payday was worth ￥40,680.

2014: Made his first cut of the season when he T52 at the Earls Beijing Open…Returned to Beijing for the Cadillac Championship and opened 70-71 on his way to a T31…In his next PGA TOUR China start, shot an even-par 72 to T27 at the Hainan Open in Sanya.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T5th in 2015 at the Nine Dragons Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 56th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
